field.label: Wizard Current Step id
field.helptext: Used to keep track of which step we are on in the wizard

skuid__text.contents: Upload an image for the app’s icon, and we’ll generate the sizes you need for both platforms.
Must be a PNG image with dimensions of 1024 x 1024 pixels. Must not have alpha channels (transparency).
Upload an image for the app’s splash screen, and we’ll generate the sizes you need for both platforms.
Must be a PNG image with dimensions of 2732 x 2732 pixels.
You’ve succesfully added all necessary graphic assets for your mobile package(s).
It looks like you’re missing one or more graphic assets required for your mobile app.
Push notifications
Enable push notifications for all mobile packages here. Actions utilizing push notifications will not function until this is enabled and any necessary certificates are added.
Push notifications enabled
Push notifications disabled. Please note that making this change will disable push notifications for all previous builds of this Native App.
Enable in order to generate an app for the iOS platform.
Enabled. Please provide the following authentication information.
An APNs certificate is required for any iOS app that uses push notifications. Provide the certificate file and APNs key below.
Upload APNs certificate *
Upload Apple certificate (.p12) *
Upload Apple provisioning file (.mobileprovision) *
Enable in order to generate an app for the Android platform.
Enabled. Please provide the following authentication information.
Upload Android keystore (.keystore) *

javascript.jsitem: // A snippet to the top of the window if the window.scroll function exists. Used when we navigate to step 2 in the wizard. window.scroll && window.scroll({top: 0});

actionsequence.label: RefreshKeys
actionsequence.description: Refreshes keys after a successful key upload

actionsequence.label: Build App
actionsequence.description: Builds the app given current changes, and will trigger push enablement afterwords if needed fields are specified

action.label: If user has chosen to enable push notifications, notify the native service
If the user has chosen to disable push notifications, and they were enabled previously, notify the native service

action.message: Error building app. Please make sure you have entered all of the required authentication information.

skuid__text.contents: App package(s) on the way!

We’re generating everything you need to publish your app. This process usually takes about five minutes as we gather and create all the files for you. Your packages will show up on your app detail page.
Return to the app detail page

skuid__modal.title: Get ready to authenticate and package your app...

skuid__text.contents: Here's your new mobile app ID
You'll need this app ID in order to generate the credentials listed, below.
{{$Model.NativeApp.data.0.native_app_id}}
On the next page, you'll be prompted to enter the following pieces of authentication information.

• Apple developer certificate
  • Apple provisioning file
  • Apple key passphrase
  • APNs certificate and key, if using push notifications

• Android keystore
  • Keystore passphrase
  • Key alias
  • Key passphrase

enableConditions.logic: (1 AND 2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7)

enableConditions.message: No platforms are enabled for packaging. Please enable packaging for iOS, Android, or both.

skuid__text.contents: MOBILE APP ID:
